definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Kenji Hiranabe is the face of agile in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 平鍋健児在日本差不多是敏捷的代言人。

sentences.english: She put an egg in the pan.
Can this pan be used to fry potatoes?
sentences.chinese: 這個平鍋能用來炸土豆嗎？

sentences.english: She flipped an egg over in the pan.
sentences.chinese: 她把平鍋裏的雞蛋猛然翻過來。

sentences.english: Put the olive oil into a pan and heat gently.
sentences.chinese: 橄欖油入平鍋加至微溫。

sentences.english: Next, slice up some onions and put them in the pan with the potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 洋蔥切片，和土豆一起放到平鍋裏。

sentences.english: Ann's in the pans in the fan.
sentences.chinese: 安娜在扇子裏的平鍋上。

sentences.english: She clashed the pans down on the stone floor.
sentences.chinese: 她將平鍋砰地一下掉在石頭地板上。
